 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּחַז‎</span>] **verb** ==be wanton, reckless== (Late Hebrew ***id.*** (rare); Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be haughty, boastful, reckless***; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּחַז‎</span>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be lascivious***, in derived species and derivatives ); — 

**Qal** ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲנָשִׁים רֵיקִים וּפֹחֲזִים‎</span> [[Judg.9.4|Judg 9:4]] of prophets [[Zeph.3.4|Zeph 3:4]] ***extravagant*** (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַנְשֵׁי בֹּגְדוֺת‎</span>).
